OrgName.entry: ROSE COTTAGE NURSING AND RESIDENTIAL CARE HOME

Desc.entry: Private dual-registered nursing and residential home. 29 beds. Organises day trips. Holds fundraising events throughout the year. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.

category.entry: CARE HOMES FOR OLDER PEOPLE (RESIDENTIAL HOMES)
CARE HOMES WITH NURSING FOR OLDER PEOPLE (NURSING HOMES)
